privacy_policy.paragraph3: For now, options to view or modify your data are not yet available, but we are working to implement them soon.

privacy_policy.paragraph5: By using our site, you accept this privacy policy.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Welcome to the slightly crazy world of Glucide en folie!
about.paragraph2: Here, it’s just me at the helm, crafting sweet recipes… but not just any recipes!
about.paragraph3: The challenge? Offering access to a delicious world without blowing the carb counter—gluten-free, lactose-free, no added sugar, and even high-protein for those who want to keep fit (or get back on track).
about.paragraph4: Because you can treat yourself without stressing, and most importantly, without guilt. I share my simple, tasty homemade recipes designed so everyone can find something they love—whether you’re diabetic, a healthy-eating fan, or just curious to try something new.
about.paragraph5: So, whether you’re here to discover ‘light but indulgent’ baking or just love a little fun, you’re in the right place! Welcome to my world, where carb madness is really about guilt-free pleasure.
